desc: "Keep Building Joy" - That is GUNPLA SA’s mission. We are inspired to share the joy and benefits of building Gundam plastic model kits as an awesome hobby! We want to show that the hobby is suitable for everyone, it can be fun, creative, inclusive, and build people closer together.

layout.text: A welcoming and safe place for all builders! Where we can hang out and express our love for the hobby. Let's build the local GUNPLA community together! International builders are welcomed too!
I'm international and want to join!
